title: TorontoJS Presents: International Women's Day North America 2023 #WTMDareToBe
details:
Details
-------

Join us on YouTube Live for this returning event at TorontoJS, **TorontoJS Presents: International Women's Day North America 2023 #WTMDareToBe**.

Women Techmakers (WTM) Ambassadors are collaborating with TorontoJS again! To celebrate International Women's Day (IWD) 2023 we are going live on YouTube Live. This year's running theme from WTM is #WTMDareToBe to enhance IWD 2023 campaign theme #EmbraceEquity. A TorontoJS organizer and WTM Ambassador, Sherry Yang will be live for two hours hosting a list of speakers powered by Google and random prize draws üéÅ. Stay tuned for what's coming to your screens on April 27th!

Meanwhile, checked out what happened last year in [this playlist](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLXoUTKvTK5ZX4THsAg-1cEmfjxh5bVuQf).

**AGENDA**

*   12:00 - Welcome remarks
*   12:10 - Caitlin Morrissey + live Q&A
*   12:40 - Janine Lee + live Q&A
*   13:10 - Macy Kuang + live Q&A
*   13:40 - Closing remarks
*   14:00 - Event closed

**SPEAKERS**  
Some topics that may be covered: personal brand, inclusive teams, career journey, startup ecosystem, and team management.

**Caitlin Morrissey - WTM Global Program Lead, Google**  
An international leader with more than a decade of experience working with Google. She supports and empowers 1,800+ leaders around the world creating an impact in their tech communities with the mission to collectively build a world where all women thrive in tech.

**Janine Lee - Global L&D Strategy & Operations Leader, Google**  
An experienced Global L&D Leader with a background in career development, DEI, and change management. She‚Äôs a Certified Executive Coach, Adjunct Professor, and Ed.D 2023 Doctoral Candidate in Organizational Change & Leadership. Her research focuses on increasing sense of belonging for Women of Color in Technology. Janine has won dozens of international awards for her leadership and DEI efforts.

**Macy Kuang - Senior Software Engineer, Miaomiao Games**  
A well-known public speaker and Google Developer Expert for IoT and wearable technologies. With over a decade of experience in the gaming industry, Macy has made significant contributions to the development of popular games. She has earned a reputation as a leading expert in AR and VR development.
